reviews.text: I've stayed here for 3 nights on Feb 2008. It was average just like what it costs - and like every retail hotels, they got standard facilities within rooms. However they got great breakfast buffet offered included in the price. The staff were very helpful and kind although some of them don't really speak English and sometimes found difficulties communicate with them. But why blame since it was in Belgium!
reviews.title: OK

reviews.text: Well come back if I have to live in Waterloo again.
reviews.title: It's an Ibis. Reasonably priced blandness rules.
Stop over at Ibis Hotel Waterloo.
reviews.text: Accor has done a great job of establishing consistency in Ibis hotels across Europe.
